full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR GYI BZLOG BSGYUR GTOR MA DANG 'BREL BA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RIN 'BYUNG NAS BSKUL BA'I 'DOD MOS LTAR, ,^ MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA WA G'INDRA SU MA TI PA TU SIDDHIS 'PHAGS MA 'DI'I GTOR MA'I LAS RIM GYI MAN NGAG DANG MI 'GAL ZHING BSKUL BA PO'I 'DOD PA DANG MTHUN PAR KHU RE @016B CHEN MOR BSDEBS PA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA SHRA MA nA PRA DZNY'A SA GA RA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,
author_simple: MKHAN MING 'DZIN PA WA G'INDRA SU MA TI PA TU SIDDHI,
